verses.english: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

derivation: a primitive root;  also as denominative from H5331 (נֶצַח)
strongs_def: properly, to glitter from afar, i.e. to be eminent (as a superintendent, especially of the Temple services and its music); to be permanent
gloss: excel, chief musician (singer), oversee(-r), set forward.

strongs_def: properly, instrumental music; by implication, a stringed instrument; by extension, a poem set to music; specifically, an epigram
gloss: stringed instrument, musick, Neginoth (plural), song.

strongs_def: properly, instrumental music; by implication, a poem set to notes
gloss: psalm.

strongs_def: Asaph, the name of three Israelites, and of the family of the first
gloss: Asaph.

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

strongs_def: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
gloss: acknowledge, acquaintance(-ted with), advise, answer, appoint, assuredly, be aware, (un-) awares, can(-not), certainly, comprehend, consider, [idiom] could they, cunning, declare, be diligent, (can, cause to) discern, discover, endued with, familiar friend, famous, feel, can have, be (ig-) norant, instruct, kinsfolk, kinsman, (cause to let, make) know, (come to give, have, take) knowledge, have (knowledge), (be, make, make to be, make self) known, [phrase] be learned, [phrase] lie by man, mark, perceive, privy to, [idiom] prognosticator, regard, have respect, skilful, shew, can (man of) skill, be sure, of a surety, teach, (can) tell, understand, have (understanding), [idiom] will be, wist, wit, wot.

strongs_def: Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory
gloss: Judah.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: from H8280 (שָׂרָה) and H410 (אֵל); he will rule as God;
strongs_def: Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
gloss: Israel.

strongs_def: great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
gloss: [phrase] aloud, elder(-est), [phrase] exceeding(-ly), [phrase] far, (man of) great (man, matter, thing,-er,-ness), high, long, loud, mighty, more, much, noble, proud thing, [idiom] sore, ([idiom]) very.

derivation: a primitive word (perhaps rather from through the idea of definite and conspicuous position; compare H8064 (שָׁמַיִם));
strongs_def: an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character
gloss: [phrase] base, (in-) fame(-ous), named(-d), renown, report.

verses.header: ¶ To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm *or* Song of Asaph.

verses.english: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

strongs_def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
gloss: beacon, [idiom] altogether, be(-come), accomplished, committed, like), break, cause, come (to pass), do, faint, fall, [phrase] follow, happen, [idiom] have, last, pertain, quit (one-) self, require, [idiom] use.

strongs_def: Shalem, an early name of Jerusalem
gloss: Salem.

strongs_def: a hut (as of entwined boughs); also a lair
gloss: covert, den, pavilion, tabernacle.

derivation: or מְעֹנָה; feminine of H4583 (מָעוֹן), and meaning the same
strongs_def: {an abode, of God (the Tabernacle or the Temple), men (their home) or animals (their lair); hence, a retreat (asylum)}
gloss: den, habitation, (dwelling) place, refuge.

derivation: the same (regularly) as H6725 (צִיּוּן)lemma צִיוּן missing dagesh, corrected to צִיּוּן;
strongs_def: Tsijon (as a permanent capital), a mountain of Jerusalem
gloss: Zion.

verses.english: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

derivation: a primitive particle (rather from the relative pronoun, H834 (אֲשֶׁר));
strongs_def: there (transferring to time) then; often thither, or thence
gloss: in it, [phrase] thence, there (-in, [phrase] of, [phrase] out), [phrase] thither, [phrase] whither.

strongs_def: to burst (literally or figuratively)
gloss: break (down, off, in pieces, up), broken (-hearted), bring to the birth, crush, destroy, hurt, quench, [idiom] quite, tear, view (by mistake for H7663 (שָׂבַר)).

strongs_def: a live coal; by analogy lightning; figuratively, an arrow, (as flashing through the air); specifically, fever
gloss: arrow, (burning) coal, burning heat, [phrase] spark, hot thunderbolt.

derivation: from H7185 (קָשָׁה) in the original sense (of H6983 (קוֹשׁ)) of bending;
strongs_def: a bow, forshooting (hence, figuratively, strength) or the iris
gloss: [idiom] arch(-er), [phrase] arrow, bow(-man, -shot).

derivation: also (in plural) feminine מְגִנָּה; from H1598 (גָּנַן);
strongs_def: a shield (i.e. the small one or buckler); figuratively, a protector; also the scaly hide of the crocodile
gloss: [idiom] armed, buckler, defence, ruler, [phrase] scale, shield.

strongs_def: drought; also a cutting instrument (from its destructive effect), as a knife, sword, or other sharp implement
gloss: axe, dagger, knife, mattock, sword, tool.

derivation: from H3898 (לָחַם) (in the sense of fighting);
strongs_def: a battle (i.e. the engagement); generally, war (i.e. warfare)
gloss: battle, fight(-ing), war(-rior).

strongs_def: suspension (of music), i.e. pause
gloss: Selah.

verses.english: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

strongs_def: to be (causative, make) luminous (literally and metaphorically)
gloss: [idiom] break of day, glorious, kindle, (be, en-, give, show) light (-en, -ened), set on fire, shine.

derivation: or (shortened); אַתָּ; or אַת; feminine (irregular) sometimes אַתִּי; plural masculine אַתֶּם; feminine אַתֶּן; or אַתֵּנָהlemma אתֵּנָה missing vowel, corrected to אַתֵּנָה; or אַתֵּנָּה; a primitive pronoun of the second person;
strongs_def: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
gloss: thee, thou, ye, you.

strongs_def: wide or (generally) large; figuratively, powerful
gloss: excellent, famous, gallant, glorious, goodly, lordly, mighty(-ier one), noble, principal, worthy.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to loom up;
strongs_def: a mountain
gloss: hill, mount(-ain).

strongs_def: something torn, i.e. a fragment, e.g. a fresh leaf, prey, food
gloss: leaf, meat, prey, spoil.

verses.english: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

strongs_def: to drop or strip; by implication, to plunder
gloss: let fall, make self a prey, [idiom] of purpose, (make a, (take)) spoil.

strongs_def: {mighty (spoken of God)}
gloss: angel, bull, chiefest, mighty (one), stout(-hearted), strong (one), valiant.

strongs_def: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
gloss: [phrase] care for, comfortably, consent, [idiom] considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), [idiom] heed, [idiom] I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), [idiom] regard(-ed), [idiom] themselves, [idiom] unawares, understanding, [idiom] well, willingly, wisdom.

strongs_def: to slumber (from drowsiness)
gloss: sleep, slumber.

strongs_def: sleep
gloss: sleep.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: properly, to come forth to, i.e. appear or exist; transitively, to attain, i.e. find or acquire; figuratively, to occur, meet or be present
gloss: [phrase] be able, befall, being, catch, [idiom] certainly, (cause to) come (on, to, to hand), deliver, be enough (cause to) find(-ing, occasion, out), get (hold upon), [idiom] have (here), be here, hit, be left, light (up-) on, meet (with), [idiom] occasion serve, (be) present, ready, speed, suffice, take hold on.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

derivation: contracted for H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ) (or perhaps rather from an unused root meaning to be extant);
strongs_def: a man as an individual or a male person; often used as an adjunct to a more definite term (and in such cases frequently not expressed in translation)
gloss: also, another, any (man), a certain, [phrase] champion, consent, each, every (one), fellow, (foot-, husband-) man, (good-, great, mighty) man, he, high (degree), him (that is), husband, man(-kind), [phrase] none, one, people, person, [phrase] steward, what (man) soever, whoso(-ever), worthy. Compare H802 (אִשָּׁה).

strongs_def: probably a force, whether of men, means or other resources; an army, wealth, virtue, valor, strength
gloss: able, activity, ([phrase]) army, band of men (soldiers), company, (great) forces, goods, host, might, power, riches, strength, strong, substance, train, ([phrase]) valiant(-ly), valour, virtuous(-ly), war, worthy(-ily).

derivation: a primitive word; in distinction from H3709 (כַּף), the closed one); used (as noun, adverb, etc.) in a great variety of applications, both literally and figuratively, both proximate and remote (as follows)
strongs_def: a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
gloss: ([phrase] be) able, [idiom] about, [phrase] armholes, at, axletree, because of, beside, border, [idiom] bounty, [phrase] broad, (broken-) handed, [idiom] by, charge, coast, [phrase] consecrate, [phrase] creditor, custody, debt, dominion, [idiom] enough, [phrase] fellowship, force, [idiom] from, hand(-staves, -y work), [idiom] he, himself, [idiom] in, labour, [phrase] large, ledge, (left-) handed, means, [idiom] mine, ministry, near, [idiom] of, [idiom] order, ordinance, [idiom] our, parts, pain, power, [idiom] presumptuously, service, side, sore, state, stay, draw with strength, stroke, [phrase] swear, terror, [idiom] thee, [idiom] by them, [idiom] themselves, [idiom] thine own, [idiom] thou, through, [idiom] throwing, [phrase] thumb, times, [idiom] to, [idiom] under, [idiom] us, [idiom] wait on, (way-) side, where, [phrase] wide, [idiom] with (him, me, you), work, [phrase] yield, [idiom] yourselves.

verses.english: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

strongs_def: a chiding
gloss: rebuke(-ing), reproof.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: Jaakob, the Israelitish patriarch
gloss: Jacob.

strongs_def: to stun, i.e. stupefy (with sleep or death)
gloss: (be fast a-, be in a deep, cast into a dead, that) sleep(-er, -eth).

strongs_def: a vehicle; by implication, a team; by extension, cavalry; by analogy a rider, i.e. the upper millstone
gloss: chariot, (upper) millstone, multitude (from the margin), wagon.

derivation: or סֻס; from an unused root meaning to skip (properly, for joy);
strongs_def: a horse (as leaping); also a swallow (from its rapid flight)
gloss: crane, horse (-back, -hoof). Compare H6571 (פָּרָשׁ).

verses.english: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

derivation: or (shortened); אַתָּ; or אַת; feminine (irregular) sometimes אַתִּי; plural masculine אַתֶּם; feminine אַתֶּן; or אַתֵּנָהlemma אתֵּנָה missing vowel, corrected to אַתֵּנָה; or אַתֵּנָּה; a primitive pronoun of the second person;
strongs_def: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
gloss: thee, thou, ye, you.

strongs_def: to fear; morally, to revere; caus. to frighten
gloss: affright, be (make) afraid, dread(-ful), (put in) fear(-ful, -fully, -ing), (be had in) reverence(-end), [idiom] see, terrible (act, -ness, thing).

derivation: or (shortened); אַתָּ; or אַת; feminine (irregular) sometimes אַתִּי; plural masculine אַתֶּם; feminine אַתֶּן; or אַתֵּנָהlemma אתֵּנָה missing vowel, corrected to אַתֵּנָה; or אַתֵּנָּה; a primitive pronoun of the second person;
strongs_def: thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
gloss: thee, thou, ye, you.

derivation: an interrogative pronoun of persons, as H4100 (מָה) is of things,
strongs_def: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
gloss: any (man), [idiom] he, [idiom] him, [phrase] O that! what, which, who(-m, -se, -soever), [phrase] would to God.

strongs_def: to stand, in various relations (literal and figurative, intransitive and transitive)
gloss: abide (behind), appoint, arise, cease, confirm, continue, dwell, be employed, endure, establish, leave, make, ordain, be (over), place, (be) present (self), raise up, remain, repair, [phrase] serve, set (forth, over, -tle, up), (make to, make to be at a, with-) stand (by, fast, firm, still, up), (be at a) stay (up), tarry.

derivation: plural (but always as singular) of an unused noun פָּנֶה; from H6437 (פָּנָה));
strongs_def: the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
gloss: [phrase] accept, a-(be-) fore(-time), against, anger, [idiom] as (long as), at, [phrase] battle, [phrase] because (of), [phrase] beseech, countenance, edge, [phrase] employ, endure, [phrase] enquire, face, favour, fear of, for, forefront(-part), form(-er time, -ward), from, front, heaviness, [idiom] him(-self), [phrase] honourable, [phrase] impudent, [phrase] in, it, look(-eth) (-s), [idiom] me, [phrase] meet, [idiom] more than, mouth, of, off, (of) old (time), [idiom] on, open, [phrase] out of, over against, the partial, person, [phrase] please, presence, propect, was purposed, by reason of, [phrase] regard, right forth, [phrase] serve, [idiom] shewbread, sight, state, straight, [phrase] street, [idiom] thee, [idiom] them(-selves), through ([phrase] -out), till, time(-s) past, (un-) to(-ward), [phrase] upon, upside ([phrase] down), with(-in, [phrase] -stand), [idiom] ye, [idiom] you.

strongs_def: at that time or place; also as a conjunction, therefore
gloss: beginning, for, from, hitherto, now, of old, once, since, then, at which time, yet.

strongs_def: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
gloss: anger(-gry), [phrase] before, countenance, face, [phrase] forebearing, forehead, [phrase] (long-) suffering, nose, nostril, snout, [idiom] worthy, wrath.

verses.english: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

derivation: dual of an unused singular שָׁמֶה; from an unused root meaning to be lofty;
strongs_def: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
gloss: air, [idiom] astrologer, heaven(-s).

strongs_def: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] attentively, call (gather) together, [idiom] carefully, [idiom] certainly, consent, consider, be content, declare, [idiom] diligently, discern, give ear, (cause to, let, make to) hear(-ken, tell), [idiom] indeed, listen, make (a) noise, (be) obedient, obey, perceive, (make a) proclaim(-ation), publish, regard, report, shew (forth), (make a) sound, [idiom] surely, tell, understand, whosoever (heareth), witness.

strongs_def: judgement (the suit, justice, sentence or tribunal); by implication also strife
gloss: cause, judgement, plea, strife.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: to fear; morally, to revere; caus. to frighten
gloss: affright, be (make) afraid, dread(-ful), (put in) fear(-ful, -fully, -ing), (be had in) reverence(-end), [idiom] see, terrible (act, -ness, thing).

strongs_def: to repose (usually figurative)
gloss: appease, idleness, (at, be at, be in, give) quiet(-ness), (be at, be in, give, have, take) rest, settle, be still.

verses.english: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

strongs_def: to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
gloss: abide, accomplish, [idiom] be clearer, confirm, continue, decree, [idiom] be dim, endure, [idiom] enemy, enjoin, get up, make good, help, hold, (help to) lift up (again), make, [idiom] but newly, ordain, perform, pitch, raise (up), rear (up), remain, (a-) rise (up) (again, against), rouse up, set (up), (e-) stablish, (make to) stand (up), stir up, strengthen, succeed, (as-, make) sure(-ly), (be) up(-hold, -rising).

strongs_def: properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style
gloss: [phrase] adversary, ceremony, charge, [idiom] crime, custom, desert, determination, discretion, disposing, due, fashion, form, to be judged, judgment, just(-ice, -ly), (manner of) law(-ful), manner, measure, (due) order, ordinance, right, sentence, usest, [idiom] worthy, [phrase] wrong.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor
gloss: [idiom] at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

derivation: or (by intermixture with H6041 (עָנִי)) עָנָיו; from H6031 (עָנָה);
strongs_def: depressed (figuratively), in mind (gentle) or circumstances (needy, especially saintly)
gloss: humble, lowly, meek, poor. Compare H6041 (עָנִי).

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: suspension (of music), i.e. pause
gloss: Selah.

verses.english: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: heat; figuratively, anger, poison (from its fever)
gloss: anger, bottles, hot displeasure, furious(-ly, -ry), heat, indignation, poison, rage, wrath(-ful). See H2529 (חֶמְאָה).

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

strongs_def: a remainder or residual (surviving, final) portion
gloss: that had escaped, be left, posterity, remain(-der), remnant, residue, rest.

strongs_def: heat; figuratively, anger, poison (from its fever)
gloss: anger, bottles, hot displeasure, furious(-ly, -ry), heat, indignation, poison, rage, wrath(-ful). See H2529 (חֶמְאָה).

strongs_def: to gird on (as a belt, armor, etc.)
gloss: be able to put on, be afraid, appointed, gird, restrain, [idiom] on every side.

verses.english: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

strongs_def: to promise (pos., to do or give something to God)
gloss: (make a) vow.

strongs_def: to be safe (in mind, body or estate); figuratively, to be (causatively, make) completed; by implication, to be friendly; by extension, to reciprocate (in various applications)
gloss: make amends, (make an) end, finish, full, give again, make good, (re-) pay (again), (make) (to) (be at) peace(-able), that is perfect, perform, (make) prosper(-ous), recompense, render, requite, make restitution, restore, reward, [idiom] surely.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: (as noun) a circle, neighbour, or environs; but chiefly (as adverb, with or without preposition) around
gloss: (place, round) about, circuit, compass, on every side.

strongs_def: properly, to flow; causatively, to bring (especially with pomp)
gloss: bring (forth), carry, lead (forth).

strongs_def: a gift (as available)
gloss: present.

derivation: or מֹרָא; or מוֹרָהxlit môrâh corrected to môwrâh; (Psalm 9:20), from H3372 (יָרֵא);
strongs_def: fear; by implication, a fearful thing or deed
gloss: dread, (that ought to be) fear(-ed), terribleness, terror.

verses.english: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.

derivation: a primitive root; to clip off; specifically (as denominative from H1210 (בָּצִיר))
strongs_def: to gather grapes; also to be isolated (i.e. inaccessible by height or fortification)
gloss: cut off, (de-) fenced, fortify, (grape) gather(-er), mighty things, restrain, strong, wall (up), withhold.

strongs_def: wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
gloss: air, anger, blast, breath, [idiom] cool, courage, mind, [idiom] quarter, [idiom] side, spirit(-ual), tempest, [idiom] vain, (whirl-) wind(-y).

strongs_def: a commander (as occupying the front), civil, military or religious; generally (abstractly, plural), honorable themes
gloss: captain, chief, excellent thing, (chief) governor, leader, noble, prince, (chief) ruler.

strongs_def: to fear; morally, to revere; caus. to frighten
gloss: affright, be (make) afraid, dread(-ful), (put in) fear(-ful, -fully, -ing), (be had in) reverence(-end), [idiom] see, terrible (act, -ness, thing).

strongs_def: a king
gloss: king, royal.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.
